body:
fixes https://github.com/LLNL/spack/issues/2540, in reference to https://github.com/LLNL/spack/pull/1832

tested on Siera with `openmpi@2.0.0`.

@mathstuf ping.

ps. this is most certainly not the best solution, but at least it fixes the critical issue of the broken MPI builds on macOS with Clang.
title: clang: do xcode mockup iff requested by a package
